name: Die In Dungeon
description:
Die in Dungeon

What's this Game

- use WASD to roll and move

- the die will automatically attack nearby after a roll

- each side of the die will be assigned to different type of attack

- player will be forced to replace one of it's attack move to another random move onece a while.

How to play

- WASD/Arrowkey: Roll the dice (move)

- Enter: Confirm, Restart Game

Assets Used

- 2D Roguelike https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/tutorials/2d-roguelike-29825

- [Joel Francis Burford Free JRPG 8-Bit Music + SFX Samples](https://joelfrancisburford.itch.io/free-jrpg-8-bitchiptune-music-sfx-sample-pack)

- [8 Bit SFX Pack](https://maskedsound.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack)

- [8-bit / 16-bit Sound Effects (x25) Pack](https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack)

Submittion of GMTK game jam 2022 "Roll of the Dice"

Development Time: approx. 10 hr (we discovered this jam quite too late lol)
